a.n: The First Hour: Far Cry New Dawn

p.k: In the latest instalment of the award-winning Far Cry franchise, Ant and Sav are the last line of defence in a transformed, post-apocalyptic Hope County. Can they help the community of Survivors grow stronger, craft a makeshift arsenal through Turf Wars and cross-country Expeditions, and form unexpected alliances to fight for survival in a dangerous new frontier?
